text: Veikko Kankkonen (born 5 January 1940) is a retired Finnish ski jumper. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and at the 1968 Winter Olympics. He won two medals in 1964 with a gold in the individual normal hill and a silver in the individual large hill event. He was born in Sotkamo, Finland. Kankkonen won the Holmenkollen medal (shared with Eero Mäntyranta, Georg Thoma, and Halvor Næs). ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Holmenkollen medalists – click Holmenkollmedaljen for downloadable pdf file * Holmenkollen winners since 1892 – click Vinnere for downloadable pdf file Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic gold medalists for Finland Category:Olympic silver medalists for Finland Category:Finnish skiers
title: Veikko Kankkonen
